I've been able to build and run the crawler.  However, now that I've
made some changes to the code, how do I build my new version?

The 'maven dist' doesn't seem to work.  It seems to hang on some cvs
business.

I tried "maven -o jar:jar" as the manual suggests for offline
building.  This didn't work either.

Any suggestions would be appreciated.  This seems like a pretty
obvious thing and might make a good FAQ entry.

  adam
